teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik

We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Express Virtual Meetings
teams.loan_because: We loan because all businesses need supporters and strong networks.

teams.name: Friends of Bob Harris
teams.loan_because:
After stumbling into a job as a luxury travel writer, I saw so much poverty that I decided to turn those paychecks into Kiva loans. Then I visited a bunch of clients, who were amazing, and I've written a book about it called "The International Bank of Bob" (Walker/Bloomsbury, March 5, 2013).

I hope the book will get more people to feel a greater understanding of Kiva, a better appreciation of the role of microfinance, and most of all, more connected to the rest of the world.
teams.description: People who realize that if we switched places with the recipients, they'd loan to us just as happily.  So, fair's fair.

teams.name: Bleeding Heart Investigators
teams.loan_because: We don't deliver the American Families Sweepstakes check, we deliver bad news.  We give because it empowers others and ourselves.
teams.description: Private Investigators and attorneys.

teams.name: Unitarian Universalists
teams.loan_because:
We believe in:
**The inherent worth and dignity of every person
**Justice, equity and compassion in human relations
**Acceptance of one another and encouragement to spiritual growth in our congregations
**A free and responsible search for truth and meaning
**The right of conscience and the use of the democratic process within our congregations and in society at large
**The goal of world community with peace, liberty, and justice for all
**Respect for the interdependent web of all existence of which we are a part.
teams.description:
We are UU congregations and individuals (including those who describe themselves as "active" or "backslid" or "interested friends" or "just looking") throughout the world. 
For more information on us, or to find a congregation near you, check out the main website for the Unitarian Universalist Association

teams.name: Indiana SEO
teams.loan_because: Lewis Virtual Services company is a world class provider of SEO for Indiana with reasonable prices and no contracts. We are members of the BBB. Free website analysis by top SEO expert. We have achieved over 60,000 Google first pages. Our service gets fast results. We will not do SEO for your direct competitor if you are our customer.
teams.description: Lewis Virtual Services company is a world class provider of SEO for Indiana with reasonable prices and no contracts. We are members of the BBB. Free website analysis by top SEO expert. We have achieved over 60,000 Google first pages. Our service gets fast results. We will not do SEO for your direct competitor if you are our customer.

teams.name: Solar Explosion
teams.loan_because: 1.5 billion people still lack electricity. Only a global solar explosion can change that and end poverty.
teams.description: We know if you really want to fight poverty, you start with distributed renewable power – harnessing the sun in your own backyard! Micro-solar technology already exists that can transform people’s lives. The problem is that banks are only financing the old model: centralized power stations and expensive transmission grids. We lend to inspire awareness, so microfinance does more and more solar financing projects. Our goal is a solar explosion! Join us today!

teams.name: The Barefoot Investor
teams.loan_because: We believe everyone can tread their own path.

teams.name: Vegetarians and Vegans on Kiva
teams.loan_because: We have a vision of a healthier, more compassionate and sustainable world. Hard work is often not enough to escape poverty and we gladly welcome the opportunity to give people and their businesses a fighting chance. Our team focus is on making loans to borrowers who don't use animals in their businesses.
teams.description: We're vegetarians and vegans, and those thinking about making the change.  We welcome everyone regardless of their motivation for going veggie.

teams.loan_because: Our qualified solar power installers in Fresno have helped many businesses and residential clients to save big on their energy bills via solar-panel systems.

teams.name: Mars Hill Lending Team
teams.description:
From 2007 to 2012, the Mars Hill community invested $1.2 million dollars to support the efforts of Turame Community Finance in Burundi, Africa. Now we are continuing our involvement with Turame in an even more hands-on-way - by becoming microfinance lenders. 

How to get involved:
1. Click the join team button to the left [if you are new to Kiva you will need to create an account].

2. Choose a Borrower: Check out the current Turame loans by scrolling down at this link: [http://bit.ly/pGU0sd] If there are no new loans, check back in as Turame posts new loans twice a month.

3. Make a Loan:

4. Get Repaid: Over the course of 6 months your loan will get repaid to you in the form of Kiva credit. [This is a loan, not a donation]

5. Repeat.  You can take the money and put it back in your pocket or make a loan to another group.

Thanks for helping support Turame Community Finance in providing loans to those living in one of the poorest countries on the planet. 
You can learn more about Turame here: www.kiva.org/partners/162

teams.name: AN D

teams.name: Guys holding fish
teams.loan_because: We feel an affinity for entrepreneurs that make their living by fishing, selling fish, or attempting to make their lives better because of their proximity to the ocean, or freshwater locales...
teams.description:
We love fish and/or fishing so much that many of us have chosen to present ourselves on KIVA with a photo of ourselves, holding a fish!  We welcome "gals" to join, as well, the name of the team notwithstanding...  

We certainly support "sustainable" fishing, but also recognize that sometimes, our "Western" views of resource management may not match the needs of the very desperate folks, in other countries, struggling to make a living, or even providing food for their families ...  Our intent is to help the struggling, without regard to their profession or trade.  We believe that our lending record well represents that goal, as we are a pretty diverse group, with very diverse lending interests....

teams.name: McGraw Hill Financial
teams.loan_because:
Corporate Responsibility is fundamental to MHFI. It guides who we are, how we conduct ourselves and how we interact with those around us.

Corporate Responsibility Essentials at MHFI encompass:

– Financial Essentials – we help to provide the fundamental financial knowledge that can build better lives, stronger communities and stable economies and financial markets. 

– Community Essentials – we help deploy and foster the resources and skills that lead to smarter, stronger, more inclusive communities. Our employees are integral partners in our dedication to this critical purpose. 

– Environmental Essentials – we offer innovative business services that promote sustainability while applying best practice to reduce the environmental footprint of our operations.
teams.description:
McGraw Hill Financial is a high-growth, high-margin benchmarks, content and analytics company serving the capital and commodity markets. MHFI believes a responsible business is one that delivers value for investors, customers, employees and communities; makes wise use of natural resources; and treats people fairly.

We are home to some of the most iconic brands in finance and business, including: Standard & Poor’s Ratings Services, S&P Capital IQ, S&P Dow Jones Indices, Platts, J.D. Power, and McGraw Hill Construction. Our independent credit ratings, indices, analytics, price assessments and research provide clients with the essential intelligence to manage risk and identify opportunities to grow.

teams.name: Your Worthy Self
teams.loan_because: One of the ways we become our most worthy & powerful self is by helping other women do the same.
teams.description: Fiercely passionate + empowered women who know that we are most powerful + beautiful when we are being of service.

teams.name: TravelStore
teams.loan_because: As global travelers, we and our clients see poverty firsthand, and choose to give back to those that can better their world through microfinance
teams.description: Caring Travel Professionals, our families and friends who believe in making a difference.

teams.name: Inspiring Ventures
teams.loan_because: We are fortunate and privileged to be able to provide for our families, and to be able to choose the lifestyle we want to live. Our core values are freedom, empowerment and making a difference - and we want to empower families around the world to create their own versions of freedom and choice too.
teams.description: Entrepreneurial parents and global families.

teams.loan_because: You change the world one kindness at a time.
teams.description: Amy Poehler's Smart Girls knows there is still inequality all over the world. The basis of that inequality is that you are being denied the ability to be yourself. We must all be be able to make choices that can lead to a better life. Micro-loans make choices available.

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142

teams.name: Dermalogica
teams.loan_because:
NEWS! In honor of International Women's Day, if you join our team, then make a loan and credit our team, we'll match your loan with one of our own!!*

We believe in the multiplier effect of supplying capital to women - supporting a woman in opening or growing a business enables her to buy food and housing for her family, send her children to school, and contribute to the welfare of her community.  We want to help put more women on the road to Financial Independence Through Entrepreneurship. Join the FITE!
* We'll match up to 3,000 loans.
teams.description: Dermalogica is the number one line of skin care products for professional skin therapists and consumers worldwide.

teams.name: Kathleen Smith Memorial Fund
teams.loan_because: we help people help themselves.
teams.description:
Not only friends of Kathleen (Dec. 25, 1959 - Feb. 16, 2011) can join, but anyone from all over the world : Kathleen visited a lot of countries, she was speaking many languages from French to Russian. 
After she left the USA, she was staying in Paris, France, for 15 years.

She was a skilled biologist and was working to help fight cancer.

If you know people with cancer or carcinomatous meningitis, this is the team you were looking for : international, open and friendly.

Welcome !
--
Cette équipe est ouverte à tous. Kathleen  (25 dec. 1959 - 16 fév. 2011) avait visité de nombreux pays et parlait plusieurs langues, du français au russe.
Après avoir quitté les USA elle s'était installée à Paris depuis près de 15 ans.
Elle était une excellente chercheuse en Biologie, et participait à la lutte contre le cancer.
Si vous connaissez des gens atteint par cette maladie, ou souffrant d'une méningite carcinomateuse, cette équipe est pour vous : internationale, ouverte et amicale.
Bienvenue !

teams.name: Calgary, Canada
teams.loan_because: Living in such a great city as Calgary with all the opportunities that entails, surely we can make an effort to help others less fortunate. We all can make a big difference with just a small loan.
teams.description:
This team is for residents of Calgary, former residents, people wtih friends and family here or for anyone who really loves the city!

To those who do not wish to receive an email when messages are posted to the board, there is a simple fix: Go to your portfolio, then your account, then email preferences and you can disable/enable from there. I myself have turned it off as I am a member of several groups and do not want to receive masses of emails.

teams.name: b2cloud
teams.loan_because: We were a start-up and LOVE helping others kick off a new venture, especially in a developing country!
teams.description: We change peoples lives by building apps for mobile devices. We use Kiva as a way to help change other peoples lives through entrepreneurship.

teams.name: Green Partnerships
teams.loan_because: We want to help create more sustainable and equitable communities all around the world.
teams.description:
We lend to individuals and groups engaged in businesses and services that help them earn a living but also help to protect the environment in their part of the world. We also strive to build green partnerships in our own communities by supporting the women and men who provide businesses, services, and products that benefit people and the Earth. 

Some of our team members mainly fund green loans, while others choose to designate a fraction of their loans to green enterprises. These are examples of just some of the loans Green Partnerships has helped to fund:

teams.name: Czech Team
teams.loan_because: People around the world helped us in the past, so we should repay.

teams.name: Young Republicans
teams.loan_because: We believe in freedom and individual empowerment. We believe in the power of the market to lift people out of poverty and create opportunities. This Kiva team will help connect Young Republicans to emerging entrepreneurs all over the world.
teams.description: We are the oldest political youth organization in the United States. Our members are Republicans ages 18-40 in chapters all over the United States. Our International Committee builds bridges to freedom-loving young professionals around the world and educates YRs about world politics.

teams.name: Kiva Muslims
teams.loan_because:
002.271 Yusuf Ali Translation:
If ye disclose (acts of) charity, even so it is well, but if ye conceal them, and make them reach those (really) in need, that is best for you: It will remove from you some of your (stains of) evil. And Allah is well acquainted with what ye do.
teams.description: Insha'Allah our team will be a collaboration of people from all walks of life united by one goal: to help those less fortunate and displaying great appreciation to our creator for blessing us to help make a differerence in the world.

teams.name: Freemasons
teams.loan_because: Faith, Hope, and Charity are our basic beliefs.
teams.description: Freemasons making a difference in the world.  Members of the world's oldest fraternity putting into practice the charity we discuss in our lodges.

teams.name: Musicians for a Cause
teams.loan_because: As Winston Churchill said, "We make a living by what we do, but we make a life by what we give". Our simple idea is that instead of giving someone a  present for their birthday or Christmas, you should give a Kiva gift certificate and let them feel the joy in changing a life. They'll be hooked and you'll forever change the way they look at what the true spirit of giving means.
teams.description: As Winston Churchill said, "We make a living by what we do, but we make a life by what we give". Our simple idea is that instead of giving someone a  present for their birthday or Christmas, you should give a Kiva gift certificate and let them feel the joy in changing a life. They'll be hooked and you'll forever change the way they look at what the true spirit of giving means.

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: Expand HCM
teams.loan_because: It's our mission to stimulate entrepreneurship and to connect people. In our business we do that in the Human Resources field. At KIva we do it for our fellow human beings.
teams.description: We are a young and professional team of highly motivated people who like to, besides make money, make a difference.
